title: [The Imperial Emporium]
description: A dashing blue and gold clad shopkeeper stands in the center of the pavilion, handing out ribbon-tied brochures to those customers willing to stop and listen to him.  Racks of scrolls and maps line the walls of the tent, broken up by a series of colorful canvas tapestries, each one detailing a different region of the Turamzzyrian Empire.
paths: Obvious exits: north, east, southwest, out
